medical_history.chief_complaint: End stage renal disease requiring hospitalization for vascular issues.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing headaches 2 years prior to hospitalization. Evaluation revealed end stage renal disease. He underwent hemodialysis for 9 months before hospitalization.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Known diagnosis of end stage renal disease; underwent bilateral nephrectomy and splenectomy for uncontrolled hypertension.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of hypertension; father died at age 45 from myocardial infarction.
